description:
Dot really wants to get a bird's eye view of the city, but flapping wings like a duck is hard work!  
Transform Dot into a helicopter!

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn the lights off when tilted face up. Then make Dot automatically show two eye lights.

hints.description: Link Start to the Lights Off state using a Face Up cue. Link the light to the Eye Ring using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically show a looping pattern of two eye lights that rotate clockwise.
Make Dot use a listener to play the helicopter sound whenever the top button is pressed.

hints.description: Link the Listener to the Helicopter sound using a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After the helicopter sound, make Dot instantly turn on red lights then automatically turn the lights off.
puzzles.introduction:
It can be dangerous to fly in the city at night. 
Let's make sure we can be seen by adding a blinking light!

hints.description: Link the Helicopter sound to the Red light using an Instant cue. Link the Red light to the Lights Off state using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot fly through the city safely. Hold Dot face up then press the top button to blink the light three times.
puzzles.introduction: It's time for a test flight!
